dsiter.reader

Interface IReaderFactory

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    FileReaderFactory, StringReaderFactory

    public interface IReaderFactory
    Interface for classes that produce Reader instances

    Many Datasets must create Reader instances for every invocation of IDataset.getIterator(). Those classes may not want to tie themselves to a particular type of Reader, and may take an instance of IReaderFactor instead.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.io.Reader getReader()
      Get a new Reader instance

      • getReader

        Returns:
        A new Reader instance
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - Subclasses may throw unspecified Exceptions (e.g. FileNotFoundException and IOException are common Exceptions to be thrown)
